original_text: The other things that happened while Jehoahaz was king are written in a book. The book is called ‘The history of Israel's kings’. It tells about all the things that Jehoahaz used his power to do.
korean_text: 여호아하스의 남은 사적과 행한 모든 일과 그의 업적은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Jehoahaz was king
sentences.korean_translation: 요아하스가 왕이 되었을 때 일어난 다른 일들

sentences.original_text: It tells about all the things
that Jehoahaz used his power to do
sentences.korean_translation: 요아하스가 그의 권력으로 행한 모든 일들
